definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

sentences.english: This forest is abundant in rare mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 這座森林充滿許多稀有的蕈類。

sentences.english: Termitomyces Heim(1941) is a kind of edible mushrooms with a good business prospects.
sentences.chinese: 雞菌屬菌物是一類具有商業前景的食物蕈菌。

sentences.english: Gross specimen and X-ray findings were mainly fungating and intraluminal types.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤大體類型及X線表現多數爲蕈傘型及腔內型。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical character of Amanita phalloides poisoning and effective treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討毒傘蕈中毒的臨牀特徵及其治療方法。

sentences.english: Truffle mushrooms are plentiful in the southwest Algeria desert.
sentences.chinese: 塊菌蕈類在西南部的阿爾及利亞沙漠是豐富的。

sentences.english: Recent genetic studies on segregation distortion of mating-type factors in mushroom were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡要綜述了近年來蕈菌交配型因子偏分離的研究概況。

sentences.english: Using topical aromatherapy for the management of fungating wounds in a palliative care unit.
sentences.chinese: 在護理中心使用局部芳香療法治療蕈狀傷口。

sentences.english: Amanitin can be detected in the blood almost immediately.
sentences.chinese: 它所產生的蠅蕈素一旦進入血液，可以很快察覺。

sentences.english: He was readmitted this time with a fungating tumor mass of hard palate and bilateral cervical lymph node enlargement.
sentences.chinese: 本次複診發現齶面腫瘤呈蕈傘狀，雙頸部淋巴結腫大。

definition: Manchurian wild rice (Zizania latifolia), now rare in the wild, formerly harvested for its grain, now mainly cultivated for its edible stem known as 茭白筍[jiao1 bai2 sun3], which is swollen by a smut fungus/(variant of 菇[gu1]) mushroom
celery wormwood (Artemisia carvifolia)/to give off/to weed
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
